verses.roman:
gopīnāthācārya uttama mahā-prasāda āni'
sārvabhaume diyā kahe sumadhura vāṇī

synonyms: gopīnātha-ācārya—Gopīnātha Ācārya; uttama—first-class; mahā-prasāda—remnants of food; āni'—bringing; sārvabhaume—to Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; diyā—delivering; kahe—says; su-madhura—very sweet; vāṇī—words.
translation: Gopīnātha Ācārya also brought first-class food and offered it to Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya while speaking sweet words.
